title: Environ. issues from econ. liberalization in China

content.question: Explain how two current environmental problems in China resulted from its economic liberalization. Describe one policy the Chinese government has developed in response to one of these environmental problems.

frqParts.text: Explain how two current environmental problems in China resulted from its economic liberalization. Describe one policy the Chinese government has developed in response to one of these environmental problems.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.7: Impact of Industrialization and Economic Development

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
